name: reservoir-kit
description: ReservoirKit is the official frontend kit to get you started building dApps with the ReservoirProtocol.
author: Reservoir Protocol

scripts.clean: pnpm -r exec --exclude primitives --exclude ssr-testing run clean
scripts.build: pnpm build:config && pnpm build:packages && pnpm build:cleanup && pnpm postbuild
scripts.build:config: mv tsconfig.json tsconfig.tmp.json && mv tsconfig.production.json tsconfig.json
scripts.build:cleanup: mv tsconfig.json tsconfig.production.json && mv tsconfig.tmp.json tsconfig.json
scripts.publish:stable: pnpm -r exec --no-private --exclude reservoir-kit --exclude demo --exclude sdk-demo npm publish --tolerate-republish --access public
scripts.tags:delete: git tag --delete sdk-demo@undefined && git tag --delete reservoir-kit-demo@undefined
scripts.package:change: pnpm changeset && git stage ./.changeset/* && git commit --m "feat: changeset" && git push
scripts.package:release: pnpm clean && pnpm build && changeset version && pnpm publish:stable && changeset tag && pnpm tags:delete && git push --follow-tags
